title: (x) CorrectVision stressed sans logo - Optima {Marc 0}
content:
Can anyone place the typeface used on this logo?  
I get to re-draw it and am having a hard time naming the font.

Thank you.

author: Guerella

comments.content: Optima Bold, squooshed horizontally to 90% and tracked.
